data.title: Anne Jeffreys
data.text:
AKA Anne Jeffreys Carmichael

Born: 26-Jan-1923

Birthplace: Goldsboro, NC

Died: 27-Sep-2017

Location of death: Brentwood, CA

Cause of death: unspecified

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Marion Kerby on Topper

Father: Mack Carmichael

Mother: Kate Jeffreys

Husband: Joseph R. Serena (m. 1945, div. 1949, annulled)

Husband: Robert Sterling (actor, m. 1951, d. 2006, three sons)

Son: Dana

Son: Jeff

Son: Tyler

University: Anderson College

Endorsement of R. J. Reynolds Camel cigarettes

Hollywood Walk of Fame 1501 Vine St.

Risk Factors: Smoking

TELEVISION

Port Charles Amanda Barrington (1999-2003)

Baywatch Irene Buchannon (1993-98)

General Hospital Amanda Barrington (1985)

Finder of Lost Loves Rita Hargrove (1984-85)

Falcon Crest Amanda Croft (1982-83)

Bright Promise Sylvia Bancroft (1969)

Love That Jill Jill Johnson (1958)

Topper Marion Kerby (1953-55)
